forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 57F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Thunder possible. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
